title: Nothing works since android 11 update
content:
I'm having issues with everything on my pixel 2xl since update
Every single thing crashes
Camera, Facebook, messenger, texting, chrome, settings, EVERYTHING
ABOUT 80% IF THE TIME MY KEYBOARD WONT EVEN COME UP TO TYPE, WAITING FOR KEYBOARD IT CRASHES TOO.
battery drains super fast.
Never had any problems until android 11 updated
